briefTitle: A Randomized Trial Evaluating Personalized vs Guideline-based Well Follow-up Strategies for Patients With Early-stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized Trial Evaluating Personalized vs Guideline-based Well Follow-up Strategies for Patients With Early-stage Breast Cancer (REaCT-Wellness)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Being referred to the Wellness Beyond Cancer Program (WBCP) for routine follow-up after completion of acute phase of treatment for invasive breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of prior invasive breast cancer, recurrent brest cancer or metastatic breast cancer
* Currently receiving zoledronate, LHRH (Gonadotropin-releasing hormone) or abemaciclib
